meanings.definition: A type of fuel used in internal combustion engines.
meanings.sent1: The gasolines powered the car down the road.
meanings.sent2: I need to fill up the tank with gasolines before we go on a long drive.
meanings.sent3: The gasolines in the car were so thirsty, they drank up all the fuel in no time!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the gasolines in the engine, propelling her forward with unstoppable energy.
meanings.sent5: The smell of gasolines lingered in the air, reminding me of road trips and adventure.

meanings.sent1: He bought two cans of gasolines for the lawnmower.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic stored various types of gasolines in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The gasolines on sale were so cheap, he couldn't resist stocking up.
meanings.sent4: The options for gasolines were as diverse as the colors of a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were lined with different brands of gasolines, each promising better performance than the last.
